title: Bottle and stopper
provenance: Christies; London (July 11, 1978, Lot 51, sale 1071); P. Warren NY
description: Oviform body on splayed faceted foot, with flared lip and pouring spout; cut diamond band center, flat vertical facets above, twisted flutes below, scalloped lip rim; cut spiral fluting top of stopper.
name: Bottle and stopper
